WorkItem.Description:
I know ActiveDocumentHost Control in VS2005 Beta1 (.NET Framework 2 beta1),but it's removed in RTM,DSOFramer are removed from Microsoft Website.FramerEx is old too.I know ActiveDocumentHost can't implements IOleDocumentSite Interface,so no ScrollBar on DocumentView.
We need a managed control to host office files,with out WebBrowser Control,with out DSOFramer,pure managed.
I try to translate DSOFramer c++ code to c#,but failed.
